div.p: Code system specifying the types of device identifiers.

publisher.value: Health Level Seven International (Health Care Devices Work Group)

description.value: Codes used to describe the Device (PHD or PHG) Identifiers, such as the system id or Bluetooth Address.

definition.value: This code indicates that the identifier is the IEEE 11073 SystemId from the equivalent of the System-Id attribute
This code indicates that the identifier is the Bluetooth MAC address, either classic or low energy
This code indicates that the identifier is the USB Pid and Vid values
This code indicates that the identifier is the ZigBee MAC address
